name: Kine
summary: Kine is a 3D puzzle game about three whimsical machines that aspire to be musicians. Embark across a theatrically rendered cityscape by solving increasingly difficult 3D puzzles. Guide Euler, Quat, and Roo as they struggle to form a band and find their big break!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Stadia
